attributes.title: Cheeto boy taunts me
attributes.review: Cheeto boy is back at it again with doing nothing for our country and focusing on himself. This app is the definition of garbo. I opened it up to get tickets to a rally, and what do I find? A miniature Cheeto puff on my screen where his ding a ling was supposed to be... like what?? Is that his peen? Or is that a cutie slice? ( no.. it was not cute. I mean the little cutie orange slices.) my hamster has a bigger wang. Anyways.. terrible app. Do not recommend 👊🏻🙅🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: Biden 2020
attributes.review: This man is a disgrace to human kind. He is destroying this country where all should be equal. He is and entitled rich white man who deserves to be wipes out by the virus he refused to acknowledge and his grave shall be danced on. He’s headed straight to hell with a front row seat. I cannot appreciate an app run by such a monster of a man and so for the same reasons he is going to hell, I’m going to have to give this app a one star review. Not sorry

attributes.title: i’d recommend you read my reasoning😞
attributes.review: These reviews are so mean 😔🧚‍♀️🌈🦋💜 you should listen to them 🌈✨🦋🧚‍♀️💕💜😌nothing is perfect🧚🏽‍♂️✨💖💫this app proved that right😍🧚🏽‍♀️🌸⚡️🌟 it went off🧚🏻👑❤️now never do it again✨❤️✨🍬this app sent me😚🧚🏼‍♀️🌸🌈to a insane asylum👑🍭😊💕this app has confidence ,💕🧚‍♀️🥰it shouldn’t tho✨❤️ i totally support you if you download this app!!❤️✨as long as you do it to leave a bad review🧚✨👑✨

attributes.title: I am mortified.
attributes.review: i downloaded the app not suspecting anything, then all of a sudden my house catches on fire and then crushed by a light tower. when i went to call 911 my phone then proceeded to display a picture i couldn’t look at without vomiting. it was some cheeto getting a spray tan. i felt sick to my stomach. i was then crushed by a target store. i’m writing this review from the grave. please do not download. please.

attributes.title: a shocking and disrespectful app 😢
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in efforts to support the trumpalumpa, but the moment i opened the app, it opened the face camera and immediately called me FAT! the graphic designer of this app even took it upon himself to find where i live and drop kick each and every one of my family members! the last time i felt this kind of disrespect was at a circle k! hate this app!

attributes.title: 👁👄👁ma’am
attributes.review: You won’t believe it I opened the app to see the most ugliest thing I’ve ever seen, it was a Donald Trump animation with flashing lights 😔 SOME PEOPLE HAVE EPILEPSY SO FIX THIS!!! 🤡 This was very offensive toward the people with epilepsy. 😡 Then I opened the app again to see Gacha Heat! 😣 The one with the wolf ears screaming, “YES HARDER!~” What is this a child’s app?! 😢 I am very disappointed in the app! And I will never understand why people even get this! Do not get!! 😤😤

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!
attributes.review: I opened up my phone and app scanned my face and immediately started yelling slurs and harmful words at me. I began to cry. Then an orange racist man started telling me to inject myself with disinfectants. I was like what?!?! Overall I would not recommend this app because after a deleted my phone exploded because the app got mad at me for not “listening.” Super scary, please don’t download!

attributes.title: Horrible...Nightmares
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE!! So I downloaded this app cuz I was like hey let’s support this Cheeto man but once i downloaded it and opened the app i fell asleep after looking at it and then i had nightmares about the Cheeto man for a whole week after that and I’m sacred and I had to get my glasses broke because of the Cheeto man and how ugly he was!! Such a horrible app and the app was so glitchy and kept crashing!

attributes.title: ⚠️TRAMATIZED!!🚨
attributes.review: I opened the app only to be absolutely terrified. The app is flooded with photos of an obese orange man staring into my soul. Everytime I try to sleep his face stares back at me. I will never be the same. Not to mention the obscene amount of false information and childish behavior spread throughout the app, every turn you take you are smacked with stupidity, definitely not worth your time don’t support this orange Cheeto at all.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This is a terrible app first of all I opened it just to see a walking Cheeto on my screen🍊then looking at the rest of the pictures was like watching a pig struggle to get out of the mud good thing I deleted it right away so I didn’t get a disease I could already feel the poison in my eyes from this walking stick of butter 🧈anyway don’t download this you’ll regret it😘😌
